body:
Comment 2 by **jdevilliers**: 
In this small example it is possible to specify the runtime type, but in the case where
the implementation of the interface is defined in a different package and not exported,
this solution does not work.  

Why is it necessary for a client of the interface to know the implementation?  What do
you do if an interface is implemented in more than one way and the returned object can
be any one of the implementations?
